name: 張瑋倫
objective:
本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.
schedule:
1 Orientation
2 Digital Transformation
3 Twin Transition /Case: Atos + PACADI analysis
4 Understand the Use of AI in Business /Case: Grow + PACADI analysis
5 Core AI Technologies /Case: PFN  + PACADI analysis
6 Psychology of Algorithm /Case: Intenseye + PACADI analysis
7 Midterm week / group project time (OFF)
8 AI contest presentation
9 The Importance of IT /Case: Salesforce + PACADI analysis
10 Business Process Reengineering  /Case: Sunrise Construction  + PACADI analysis
11 Enterprise Resource Planning /Case: VLF Hospital  + PACADI analysis
12 Customer Relationship Management /Case: Luckin Coffee  + PACADI analysis
13 Supply Chain Management /Case: Easy flower + PACADI analysis
14 Business Case Analysis and Presentation
